page.title: 05Sarn Forest
page.content: The total area of{Sarn Forest}is 1772.8 hectares.The bulk of the area lies to the south east of Kerry village on the Sarn Hills.The productive area of the forest is 1611.4 hectares which was planted from about 1920 to today.It consists of 756 spruce,126 Douglas fir,96 larch,16 pine and 36 other conifers.16.9 hectares of the forest is under broad leaved trees such as oak,ash and beech.21.4 hectares are forest estate (houses and farms.)12.2 hectares is uncleared wind_blown trees,blown down in the 1977/78 gales in small areas that are not worth harvesting.110.9 hectares of area have been felled and cleared and are ready for replanting. The average replanting program is 50 hectares a year to catch up with the areas harvested after the wind blow of 1977/78.
